title: Delighted mother welcomes huge 12-pound baby boy
text:
Batina Irving (pictured) and Alonzo Vaughan welcomed their newborn Kenneth on Thursday, who weighed an astonishing 12 pounds and four ounces. (Picture: WSET/ Dee Ka’yansta Woodson)

A delighted mother welcomed an enormous baby boy weighing 12 pounds into the world.

Batina Irving delivered her son, Kenneth Steaven Major Vaughan, alongside the newborn’s father, Alonzo Vaughan, on Thursday at Virginia Baptist Hospital in Lynchburg.

Kenneth’s official weight at the time of birth was 12 pounds and four ounces.

He was measured at 22 inches long, according to WSET.

Irving and Vaughan are reportedly doing well and are adjusting to life with their new son.

Metro US has reached out to Virginia Baptist Hospital for a statement on whether Kenneth is the biggest baby ever born at the hospital, however a hospital spokeswoman said such records are not kept.

It is unclear whether Batina had a natural birth or Cesarean section, and whether she knew just how big her son would be in advance of his birth.
description: Batina Irving and Alonzo Vaughan welcomed their son, Kenneth Steaven Major Vaughan, on Thursday at Virginia Baptist Hospital in Lynchburg.
